meanings.definition: The act of transporting goods by air.
meanings.sent1: Airfreighting is a quick way to send packages across long distances.
meanings.sent2: Many companies rely on airfreighting to deliver products to customers on time.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to try airfreighting fish to the North Pole for a change.
meanings.sent4: In the world of logistics, airfreighting is like a superhero speeding through the sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of airfreighting crates of fresh fruit creates a sense of urgency and efficiency.

meanings.definition: The process of sending items via air transport.
meanings.sent1: Airfreighting involves carefully packing items for safe travel in airplanes.
meanings.sent2: During peak seasons, airfreighting can become more expensive due to high demand.
meanings.sent3: The idea of airfreighting a birthday cake to space sounded fun but challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight, airfreighting her aspirations to new heights.
meanings.sent5: The concept of airfreighting medical supplies to remote areas saves lives and time.
